TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 930-931
TEI.2.document_title: McKinstry and Austin to Stephen F Austin, 03-03-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with McKinstry and Austin, March 3, 1833. Bill for purchases and advances.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 930-931
